author: Boudewijn Vork
description: This chili-spiced Amaretto Sour originally packed 35ml of chili liqueur. If you're more vindaloo than chicken korma, then go with the original spec., or, if you'er more korma then perhaps go with less than the 25ml I've used.
name: Sombretto

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
